content: Install required Python packages (emergentintegrations, apscheduler, pandas, numpy, aiohttp, gspread, etc.)
Install required frontend packages (framer-motion, lightweight-charts, recharts, react-gauge-component, lucide-react, sonner)
Update index.css with design tokens and load fonts in public/index.html
Create Shadcn UI components and all MVP files in bulk
Test backend: Check for import errors and fix linting issues
Test frontend: Compile and check for errors
Restart services and verify the application loads
